name: lumen stones
description:
• clear blocks and score points by making rectangles!
  • move onto a block to destroy it.
  • increase your score multiplier by chaining rectangles

wasd/arrow keys to turn

space to move

quickplay: get the highest score you can in 108 moves

marathon: reach a score of 9999 in the fewest possible moves

created in 48 hours for goblin bunker game jam 2

music by dear synthia: https://dearsynthia.bandcamp.com/
